member.name: T:DocumentedClasses.Sprinkler
member.summary: Sprinkler object. See for member details.

remarks.para: All garden contents have the basic properties and specifying position, and the readonly properties and specifying dimensions.
An ASCII representation of the object can be obtained by overrides of the method.

member.name: M:DocumentedClasses.GardenContent.GetPlan
member.summary: Obtains a array representing how the object will look in a garden plan, using a simple ASCII representation.
member.returns: returns a array, where the dimensions of the array are determined by the Width and Depth properties.

member.name: T:DocumentedClasses.Garden
member.summary: Class representing a garden, and the contents of that garden.

remarks.para: Use the method to add contents, which must inherit from .
Once contents have been added the garden can be visualised using the method.

Suitable classes for adding include:
Class Description
Represents a flower, size 1x1.
Represents a tree, size 2x2.
Represents a bush, size 2x2.
Represents a sprinkler, size 1x1.
Represents a statue, size 1x1.
Represents a bench, size 5x2.

member.exception: This exception is thrown if an object is added and doesn't fit in the garden.

member.name: M:DocumentedClasses.Garden.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Constructor that sets the dimensions of the Garden object.
member.param: Width of the Garden object (size on x-axis).
Depth of the Garden object (size on y-axis).

member.name: M:DocumentedClasses.Garden.Add(DocumentedClasses.GardenContent)
member.summary: Adds an object to the garden.
member.param: The object to add, which must inherit from .

member.name: M:DocumentedClasses.Garden.Remove(DocumentedClasses.GardenContent)
member.summary: Removes an object from the garden.
member.param: The object to add, which must inherit from .

member.name: M:DocumentedClasses.Garden.Contains(DocumentedClasses.GardenContent)
member.summary: Determines whether an object is in the garden.
member.param: The object to look for, which must inherit from .
member.returns: A value, stating whether the object is in the garden.

member.name: M:DocumentedClasses.Garden.GetChar(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Obtains the ASCII character at location (x, y) in the garden plan, taking garden objects into account.
member.returns: returns a array, where the dimensions of the array are determined by the Width and Depth properties.

member.name: M:DocumentedClasses.Garden.GetPlan
member.summary: Obtains a array showing the garden and all its contents. Individual objects are shown according to their ASCII representation.
